<h1> Change Log </h1>
<hr>

<h5> 0.0.6 (17/05/2021) </h5>

- New dependency
    * cryptography
<br>
- New tools
    * Tools for encryption management.
    * Tool for creating complex codes and passwords.
    * Tool for encapsulating texts with special characters.
<br>
- Updates
    * `Description` file extension changed to ** `.md` **
    * Changed the description of the library
    * Updated code documentation
    * Created a brief documentation in the description of the library <small>(Official documentation still under development)</small>

<hr>
